# Scripps Research graduate program comp bio/bioinformatics course offerings Analysis for Manuscript

## Setting up environment

```{r}
library(magrittr)
library(zoo)
library(dplyr)
library(scCustomize)
library(stringr)
```

## Scripps Research graduate program comp bio/bioinformatics course offerings

```{r}
## Figure 2: Plotting Scripps Research comp bio/bioinformatics course offerings
courses <- data.frame(years = c("2023-2024", "2022-2023", "2021-2022",	'2020-2021',	'2019-2020',	"2018-2019", "2017-2018",	"2016-2017", "2015-2016",	"2014-2015",	"2013-2014", "2012-2013", "2011-2012") %>% rev(),
                      Freq = c(5, 5, 3, 6, 2, 5, 3, 2, 2, 2, 1, 3, 3) %>% rev())
colors1 <- DiscretePalette_scCustomize(num_colors = 1, palette = "varibow", shuffle_pal = TRUE)

par(mar = c(8, 6, 4, 2))  # c(bottom, left, top, right)
bp <- barplot(height = courses$Freq, las = 2, axes = FALSE,
        col = colors1, ylim = c(0,6))
mtext("Number of Computational/Bioinformatics\nCourses Offered by Scripps Research", side = 2, line = 2, cex = 1.5)  ## Y axis margin text
mtext("Academic year", side = 1, line = 6)  ## X axis margin text
axis(1, at = bp, labels = courses$years, las = 2, line = -0.5, tick = F)  ## X axis label
axis(2, at = seq(0, 6, by = 1), las = 2, cex = 1.5)
```
